title: (Champion suggestion) Kalimar- Assassin of the new ages.
body:
Thinking about assassin champions, most of them work in a way where the targets are in a 1v1 situation, so this one i have decided to be vastly different. Kalimar will be an assassin champion perfect at deleting enemies in teamfights forcing them to split up or suffer dear casualties.
Hp 515+87 5/5sec +0.38 AD 57+3.85 Atk speed 0.686+1.21% Armor 20+1.54 MR 18+ 1.13 Speed 345
Passive False sense of safety.
Enemy champions near their allies will take 5/7/9/11% more damage from Kalimar. (525 units)
Q: Blink Strike. 11/10.75/10.5/10.25/10sec CD
Stealthes for 1 sec, gaining 50/60/70/80/90% more speed for the duration. After appearing, the next basic attack deals 20/30/40/50/60% bonus damage and slows by 10% for 1.5 sec.
W:  Blending Smash 21/20.25/19.5/18.75/18sec
Heavily Smashes an enemy dealing AD+20/50/90/140/200 damage to an enemy unit
+100TD  if it is a minion/monster.
If it is a champion, takes 30/35/40/45/50 more damage for each nearby ally within 525 units knocking them to the edge of the effected ring. taking the same damage.
E: Punishment. 15/14.25/13.5/12.75/12sec
Strikes the enemy with a very painful blow, dealing base AD + 30/45/60/75/90 bonus dmg combined with 3/4/5/6 (scale at levels 1/6/11/16) of their max, current and missing hp. 
R: Shackles of Death 100/95/90sec 525 radius chain.
Selecting one enemy within 750range, sprouting chains that causes all of his allied champions who are within 525 radius around him to be shackled, if they are not able to move more than 725 spaces around the bounded ally within 1.25sec, they will be chained to the selected unit, unable to move out of 727spaces. Dealing 100/200/300AD+125/150/175% ad on contact. Lasts 5 sec.
Each shackled ally slows the others by 10% and reducing armor and MR by 10% due to the heavy weight carried.
